org.dgfoundation.amp.ar

Class GroupReportDataCacher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.ar.GroupReportDataCacher

  • public class GroupReportDataCacher
extends java.lang.Object
    per-HttpSession LRU cache holding GroupReportData instances, which knows how to regenerate them.
    GroupReportData instances are keyed by a ReportContextData - because a RCD holds all the necessary data to regenerate a GroupReportData instance
